org.opentosca.toscana.plugins.cloudformation.util

Class AuthenticationUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opentosca.toscana.plugins.cloudformation.util.AuthenticationUtils

  • public class AuthenticationUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Builds IAM resources and authentications to access S3 buckets.
    See Also:
    AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM), AWS CloudFormation Authentication
